post.author: 송강호
post.content:
in Form1

private void button1_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
    Form2 f2 = new Form2();
    f2.ShowDialog(this);
}


In Form2
private void button1_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
    string s = this.Owner.ToString();
    MessageBox.Show(s.ToString());
}
post.title: [re] C# call parent form's method.
